home.quote: There is no disease in a healthy body. Your body is wise.
home.floating_desc: Awakening your inner healer without dependencies.
home.prog_edu_desc: Lectures on life philosophy and nutrition.
home.prog_eco_desc: Farm visits, lodging, and nature contact.
home.prog_home_desc: Therapies and diagnosis in your home in Bogota.
home.pillar_1_desc: Urine therapy moves and strengthens the immune system.
home.cta_title: Start your path to a full life

about.bio_p1: Born in Manchuria (1944), studied Oriental Medicine in Tokyo.
about.bio_p2: Founded the Natural Hospital in Nicaragua.
about.alicia_desc: Originally from Bogota, Dr. Alicia is an expert homeopathic therapist. She has extensive knowledge in pain treatment using magnets (biomagnetism), Reiki, and Acupuncture.

program.edu_full_desc: Our education cycle is designed to transform consciousness. It includes master lectures on health philosophy, conscious nutrition workshops, and self-management practices for chronic diseases.
program.eco_full_desc: Escape the city and reconnect with nature at our farm in Anolaima. We offer family lodging, ecological walks, organic food from our garden, and experiential workshops.
program.home_full_desc: We bring the Biohealth experience to your home. Comprehensive diagnosis, pain therapies with magnets and acupuncture, and personalized advice for patients with reduced mobility.
